column1: feedback_text

The new dashboard is incredibly fast and intuitive. Great job,
team!

Your customer support was fantastic! Maria was so helpful and resolved my
issue in minutes.
I absolutely love this product. It has saved me so much time.

While the initial setup took a moment, the performance improvements are very
noticeable. I'm happy with the update.
Five stars! Would recommend to anyone.

The app crashed three times today while I was trying to save my work. I lost
everything.

I was charged twice for my subscription this month. This is
unacceptable.

The latest update removed a feature I used every day. Why would you do
that?
The user interface is confusing and looks very outdated.

I've been on hold for 45 minutes trying to reach support. Terrible
service.
Wow, the price went up again with no new features. Just great.
How do I change my payment information?
I need a copy of my invoice for last month.
Could you add a feature for exporting data to PDF?
I need to reset my password but the link has expired.
What are the system requirements for running the software?
The trial period for my account ends in three days.

The response time is incredibly slow, making the tool almost unusable during
peak hours.

Thank you for the quick turnaround on my ticket, the issue is now
resolved.
The documentation is clear and easy to follow.

The button to confirm the purchase is not working on the mobile
app.
I am trying to find out your business hours.
The product does what it says, but the design could be improved.
Where is the 'Settings' menu located?
This is by far the best tool I have used for project management.
